contentrichtext.text: [[File:Orsha-M1Route.JPG|thumb|right|250px|[[M1 highway (Belarus)|M1]] highway at [[Orsha]]]] [[File:Belarus-Minsk-Airport Minsk-1 (2).jpg|thumb|right|250px|[[Minsk-1 Airport]] building]] [[File:Ziu-Brest.jpg|thumb|right|250px|A [[Trolleybus]] in [[Brest, Belarus|Brest]]]] [[File:Dvina-vitebsk.jpg|thumb|right|250px|A ferry crossing the [[Daugava]] river in [[Vitebsk]]]] [[File:AutoStationGomel.jpg|thumb|right|250px|The autobus station of [[Gomel]]]] This article is about '''transport in [[Belarus]]'''. For Soviet transportation, see [[Transport in the Soviet Union]]. == Railways == {{main|Rail transport in Belarus}} [[Rail transport in Belarus]] is operated by [[Belarusskaya Chyhunka]]<ref>[http://www.rw.by BŽD / Белорусская Железная Дорога] official site</ref> <br>''total:'' 5,512 km <br>''country comparison to the world:'' 32 <br>''broad gauge:'' 5,497 km of {{RailGauge|1520mm}} gauge (874 km electrified) (2006) *City with [[rapid transit|underground]] railway system: [[Minsk]], see [[Minsk Metro]] *For tramway systems: see [[List of town tramway systems in Belarus]] == Highways == {{main|Roads in Belarus}} ''total:'' 93,055 km <br>''paved:'' 93,055 km (2003) == Waterways == 2,500 km (use limited by location on perimeter of country and by shallowness) (2003) <br>''country comparison to the world:'' 37 == Pipelines == gas 5,250 km; oil 1,528 km; refined products 1,730 km (2008) == Ports and harbors == * [[Mazyr]] - on the river [[Pripyat River|Pripyat]] == Airports == 65 (2008): <br>''country comparison to the world:'' 76 * [[Minsk International Airport]] * [[Minsk-1]] * [[Gomel Airport]] === Airports - with paved runways === {{main|List of airports in Belarus}} ''total:'' 35 <br>''over 3,047 m:'' 2 <br>''2,438 to 3,047 m:'' 22 <br>''1,524 to 2,437 m:'' 4 <br>''914 to 1,524:'' 1 <br>''under 914 m:'' 6 (2008) === Airports - with unpaved runways === ''total:'' 30 <br>''2,438 to 3,047 m:'' 1 <br>''1,524 to 2,437 m:'' 1 <br>''914 to 1,523 m:'' 2 <br>''under 914 m:'' 26 (2008) === Heliports === 1 (2007)Heliports is where helicopter land. === National air-carrier === *[[Belavia]] ==See also== *[[Transport in the Soviet Union]] *[[Vehicle registration plates of Belarus]] ==References== {{CIA World Factbook|year=2006}} {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commonscat-inline}} {{Belarus topics}} {{Transportation in Europe}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Transport In Belarus}} [[Category:Transport in Belarus| ]]
